name: What's in the Cellar (SirPugithy, SirMiles)
description: What's in the Cellar was created for the "Callum Upton" game jam under the theme “Horror”. The Game is a short 2-3 minute game that can be enjoyed even after a few play-throughs. In the future, the game may be added upon. Currently, there are no plans to do so.
